alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 3:30AM PST until March 05 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow showers this morning. Plan on slippery road conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County, Burney Basin / Eastern Shasta County, Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley, Motherlode and Western Plumas County/Lassen Park. * WHEN...Until 1 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County; Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
